title: Web-Based Competency Development Program for Multicultural Workplace Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in office administration
context.additional_context: Performing multicultural collaborative projects in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Identify and apply at least three communication strategies for effective collaboration with multicultural team members.
Independently develop a project proposal considering cultural differences using web-based tools.
Provide feedback reflecting cultural sensitivity principles with at least 80% accuracy in online discussions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
